meanings.definition: (of an element) unchanged when multiplied by itself.
meanings.sent1: The idempotent number remained the same even after being multiplied by itself.
meanings.sent2: The idempotent property of the number made it easy to calculate.
meanings.sent3: The idempotent cookie recipe never changed no matter how many times I baked it.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was idempotent, growing stronger with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The idempotent rock formation stood unchanged for centuries.

meanings.definition: (of a function) producing the same result when applied multiple times.
meanings.sent1: The idempotent function always gave the same output when used repeatedly.
meanings.sent2: The idempotent algorithm simplified the process by avoiding unnecessary calculations.
meanings.sent3: The idempotent printer kept printing the same document over and over by mistake.
meanings.sent4: His words were idempotent, leaving a lasting impact on everyone who heard them.
meanings.sent5: The idempotent clock struck the same hour again and again.
